title: Philippines Foreign Direct Investment
description: Foreign Direct Investment in Philippines increased by 800 USD Million in August of 2022. Foreign Direct Investment in Philippines averaged 445.24 USD Million from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2675 USD Million in December of 2021 and a record low of -396 USD Million in June of 2007. This page provides - Philippines Foreign Direct Investment- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bangko Sentral NG Pilipinas
